sub_title: Senior Director, Decision and Disclosure, WBCSD: Passionate leader for net positive business, ESG performance, and sustainability certification
summary:
	Sustainability professional with over 20 years experience, driving the agenda for net positive impact through responsible business, ESG performance improvement and sustainable sourcing practice. 
	Visionary leader able to spearhead inclusive strategy setting, integrating ESG and sustainability performance across organisational governance, implementation and delivery,  internal culture change and stakeholder engagement based on clear vision, shared value, transparent communication, strategic partnership building and staff empowerment.
	Experienced in managing large global teams implementing sustainability and impact focused programs in Africa, Asia, Latin America, Middle East, Europe & the UK. 
	Specialist in sustainability certification and verification, including Standard development, risk-based assurance innovations, quality management of assurance providers and development of IT platforms and digital services.
	Experienced in the development of data-enabled value-driven products and services including user-focused design, market feedback, business process mapping and systems integration.
	Effective program manager, skilled in user-centered product and service design, development and implementation of multimillion dollar projects to deliver on the SDGs and create positive social and environmental impact across the globe. 
	Skilled in developing delivery and risk sharing partnerships to support impact, increase value for customers, foster innovation, target resource mobilisation and drive brand value through transparent disclosure, impact reporting and engagement- focused storytelling
	Inspiring communicator able to engage businesses, communities, governments, NGOs, development partners and funders on their own terms and all over the world, to forge shared agendas for action and develop effective partnerships to achieve results. 
	Empathetic and empowering team leader, servant leader, manager, mentor and coach.
	Masters degree with additional certification in Sustainable Capitalism and ESG, Corporate Responsibility and Sustainability Strategies, Climate Smart Landscapes, IEMA Environmental Management, ISO 14001 Lead Auditor & SA8000:2014. 
	Fluent English, French and Italian, Working knowledge of Spanish and  Portugese

profile_positions.description:
	Lead program to support WBCSD’s 200+ global companies to implement corporate sustainability reporting, ISSB, ESRS, CSDDD, TCFD, TNFD, SASB, CDP, SBTI, GRI and national regulations. 
	Lead program supporting global companies to embed sustainability in strategy development enterprise risk management and integrated performance management. 
	Co-developed program of engagement with business and ecosystem partners for alignment and simplification for carbon target setting, transition planning, carbon accounting and corporate reporting for COP 28. 
	Launched Coalition for Integrated Sustainability Assurance to strengthen capacity in companies to produce credible, verified, decision-useful sustainability information - aligning professional bodies for management, accountancy, internal audit, external audit and assurance standard setters.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director, Decision and Disclosure

profile_positions.description:
	Lead the development, launch and transition to the new 2020 Rainforest Alliance Sustainable Agriculture Certification Program at farm and supply chain level, including development of the new Standard, risk-based assurance innovations, authorisation and quality management of assurance providers and development of IT platforms and digital services.
	Lead business process mapping and the development of business and product requirements for digital transformation and automation of certification and verification processes including risk and performance data reporting to drive efficiency, risk management and new service development.
	Developed and communicated compelling value propositions for Rainforest Alliance certification and new product development for key stakeholder groups, building on the current trends of conscious consumerism, ESG and impact investment, staff and shareholder activism, climate disclosure, impact reporting and regulatory due diligence and anti-greenwashing measures. 
	Spearheaded the vision and operational approach for organisational change to achieve greater integration of certified supply chain and landscape level interventions to meet changing stakeholder needs, develop user focused service offerings and increase the organisations impact, scale and reach.
	Managed team of 60+ staff to implement Standard setting, verification rules, quality management and capacity building of verification providers, and data-driven risk and performance analysis to inform the development of value added products and services and resource mobilisation
	Developed partnerships for context specific risk data and user-focused support services to drive investments for sustainability improvements throughout the supply chain,
